content: middle of the heel pattern pm to indicate end of instep gusset decreases westley and buttercup charts are worked 8 8 8 10 round 1 decrease round knit to last 2 stitches times per round before first instep marker k2tog sm work 29 33 37 41 sts in pattern as established sm ssk knit to 29 33 37 41 sts instep/27 31 35 39 sts heel end of round round 2 knit around as established pattern on note to mirror socks begin westley/buttercup charts instep and stockinette on sole on row 9 11 13 for mate repeat these two rounds until 56 64 72 80 stitches remain 29 33 37 41 instep sts/27 31 35 39 sole sts heel will be worked over 27 31 35 39 sts place remaining 29 33 37 41 sts on a holder for instep foot continue working as established until foot heel flap is worked back and forth measures approximately 1 1/4 1 1/2 1 3/4 2 inches less than desired foot length ending on row 8 10 12 heel flap 10 or row 16 20 24 20 if foot is still not long row 1 rs ktbl k1 *slip 1 k1 repeat from * to last enough to begin toe continue to knit even rounds st slip 1 wyif turn until foot is correct length row 2 ws ktbl p across to last st slip 1 wyif turn row 3 ktbl k2 *slip 1 k1 repeat from * to last 2 transition round to toe sts k1 slip 1 wyif turn remove marker indicating beginning of round knit to row 4 ktbl p across to last st slip 1 wyif turn first instep marker shift 1 stitch from instep to sole repeat row 1-4 until heel flap measures 2 1/2 inches pm to indicate beginning of instep k29 32 36 40 or desired length ending on row 1 or 3 sts pm to indicate new beginning of round 28 32 36 40 instep sts/28 32 36 40 sole sts turn heel row 1 ws slip 1 p15 17 19 23 p2tog p1 turn toe row 2 slip 1 k6 6 6 8 ssk k1 turn round 1 decrease round k1 ssk knit to last 3 row 3 slip 1 p7 7 7 9 p2tog p1 turn stitches before first instep marker k2tog k1 sm row 4 slip 1 k7 10 9 10 ssk k1 turn k1 ssk knit across to last 3 stitches before second instep marker k2tog k1 continue working one more stitch until all the stitches round 2 k have been worked you should end on a knit row with 17 19 21 25 sts remaining do not turn work work rounds 1-2 until 28 32 36 40 sts remain begin gusset work decrease round only until 16 20 20 24 sts remain use kitchener stitch to graft toes weave in gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each slipped all loose ends stitch along side of heel pm to
